TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace>
Public Class FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection Inherits Collection(Of FileDialogCustomPlace)

summary.span: 表示 类的 Windows Vista 自定义区域的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of Windows Vista custom places for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]，此类不具有任何影响。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeDialogAndButton`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: 将一个自定义空间添加到 集合。

span.span: Adds a custom place to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件夹添加到仅为特定的自定义区域并且不是系统或应用程序范围的更改。The folder is added to custom places only for a particular and is not a system or application wide change. 在将它们添加到顺序的自定义位置中的位置文件夹。The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the . 添加的最后一个将在顶部。The last one added will be at the top. 如果将自定义空间添加到运行应用程序的计算机不存在的集合，则不会显示的自定义位置。If you add a custom place to the collection that does not exist on the computer running the application, the custom place will not be shown. Guid 不区分大小写。GUIDs are case-insensitive. 有关可用的列表[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]已知的文件夹，请参阅[文件对话框自定义区域的已知文件夹 Guid](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md)或中的 KnownFolders.h 文件[!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]。For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeDialogAndButton`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]
